AB ANALITICA 参与 DECIDER 项目 en AB ANALITICA 与 DECIDER 项目合作，借助 AI 改善卵巢癌的诊断和治疗 - 来自欧盟的 1500 万欧元资助https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/AB-ANALITICA-partners-in-DECIDER-project-en.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/AB-ANALITICA-partners-in-DECIDER-project-en.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f0979a5-2159-4b1d-b73e-2e782f9b2cc7 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 01:33:00 -0400 AB ANALITICA partners in DECIDER project en
AB ANALITICA x SNIBE 合作伙伴关系 – 2024 年 7 月 22 日AB ANALITICA 和 SNIBE 自豪地宣布在意大利建立 SNIBE Molecision R8 平台分销合作伙伴关系，两家公司将专注于该平台上下一代分子测试的开发和商业化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/AB-ANALITICA-x-SNIBE-partnership-e28093-July-22-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/AB-ANALITICA-x-SNIBE-partnership-e28093-July-22-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1328232-bf4e-4a38-9568-eac4d3e06ed6 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 01:17:00 -0400 AB ANALITICA x SNIBE partnership – July 22, 2024
3DHISTECH 推出新旗舰 P480 第二代，采用偏光技术3DHISTECH 推出其最新旗舰产品 P480 第二代。凭借 P480 十年来的卓越研究和诊断经验，P480 第二代引入了新功能并采用了显着的增强功能，以满足现代数字化实验室不断变化的需求和紧迫性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/3DHISTECH-launches-the-new-flagship-P480-2nd-Generation-powered-with-polarization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/3DHISTECH-launches-the-new-flagship-P480-2nd-Generation-powered-with-polarization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51ac0b51-a06e-46be-987f-56ee756adb73 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 01:16:00 -0400 3DHISTECH launches the new flagship P480 2nd Generation, powered with polarization
一起看那些看不见的事。 3DHISTECH 和巴可出席 2024 年第 20 届欧洲数字病理学大会ECDP 2024 活动汇聚了数字病理学领域的专家、研究人员和行业领导者。 6 月 6 日至 8 日，与我们一起在立陶宛维尔纽斯参加激动人心的合作，有望推进研究和创新！ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Seeing-the-unseen-together-3DHISTECH-and-Barco-at-the-20th-European-Congress-on-Digital-Pathology-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Seeing-the-unseen-together-3DHISTECH-and-Barco-at-the-20th-European-Congress-on-Digital-Pathology-2024.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=128379d8-8c08-40d6-86e4-8e0a8423336c Mon, 23 Sep 2024 01:04:00 -0400 Seeing the unseen, together. 3DHISTECH and Barco at the 20th European Congress on Digital Pathology 2024
利拉鲁肽激活关键脑回路以引发肥胖者减肥研究人员揭示了利拉鲁肽如何靶向特定的大脑区域，通过 GLP-1 受体激活来抑制食欲并促进显着减肥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Liraglutide-activates-key-brain- Circuits-to-trigger-weight-loss-in-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Liraglutide-activates-key-brain- Circuits-to-trigger-weight-loss-in-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82608f95-d3e7-408a-81eb-ad4bc3d57f4e Mon, 23 Sep 2024 00:48:00 -0400 Liraglutide activates key brain circuits to trigger weight loss in obesity
不顾医疗建议出院与服药过量风险增加有关根据 CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）的最新研究，过早或“在医疗建议之前”(BMA) 出院的人在接下来的一个月内服药过量的风险会增加 10 倍 https://www .cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj.240364。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Hospital-discharges-against-medical-advice-tied-to-increased-overdose-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Hospital-discharges-against-medical-advice-tied-to-increased-overdose-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8178ec3f-7632-4876-a535-911ed8988d20 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 00:40:38 -0400 Hospital discharges against medical advice tied to increased overdose risk
MaxCyte 与 Kamau Therapeutics 签署战略平台许可，加速遗传病细胞疗法的开发MaxCyte, Inc. 是一家专注于细胞工程的领先公司，提供支持平台技术，以推进下一代细胞疗法和创新生物加工应用的发现、开发和商业化；Kamau Therapeutics 是一种临床阶段的干细胞治疗基因校正公司今天宣布他们正在签订战略平台许可（SPL）协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/MaxCyte-signs-strategic-platform-license-with-Kamau-Therapeutics-to-accelerate-the-development-of-cell-therapies-for-genic-疾病.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/MaxCyte-signs-strategic-platform-license-with-Kamau-Therapeutics-to-accelerate-the-development-of-cell-therapies-for-genic-疾病.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6807e2e4-f478-48d9-9ab5-8b810a8ee2be Mon, 23 Sep 2024 00:33:00 -0400 MaxCyte signs strategic platform license with Kamau Therapeutics to accelerate the development of cell therapies for genetic diseases
用于增强情绪检测和理解的多模式人工智能系统研究人员希望通过融合传统和新颖的技术方法来更好地量化情绪，以改变情绪量化领域的面貌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Multi-modal-AI-systems-for-enhanced-emotion-detection-and-understanding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Multi-modal-AI-systems-for-enhanced-emotion-detection-and-understanding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ed9d38d-b405-4a39-973f-a24a96ad9794 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 00:25:03 -0400 Multi-modal AI systems for enhanced emotion detection and understanding
Yoyo节食会改变肠道健康，导致体重反弹和炎症迪肯大学的研究人员揭示了溜溜球节食如何破坏肠道健康，导致体重反弹和肥胖相关并发症。该研究强调了肠道微生物群、激素和炎症在体重循环过程中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Yoyo-dieting-alters-gut-health-driven-weight-regain-and-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Yoyo-dieting-alters-gut-health-driven-weight-regain-and-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd6ed5d7-11fa-423b-b313-a2fc791ed5b5 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 00:22:00 -0400 Yoyo dieting alters gut health, driving weight regain and inflammation
研究揭示食物抗原的抗肿瘤特性日本理化学研究所综合医学中心 (IMS) 的 Hiroshi Ohno 领导的研究人员发现，牛奶蛋白等食物抗原有助于防止肿瘤在我们的肠道（特别是小肠）中生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-reveals-anti-tumor-properties-of-food-antigens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-reveals-anti-tumor-properties-of-food-antigens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=750a263d-90bd-4b7b-b69c-5f045fece293 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 00:15:37 -0400 Study reveals anti-tumor properties of food antigens
